insert into movie (movie_no, movie_name, movie_level, movie_genre, movie_content, movie_director, movie_actor, movie_runtime) values (movie_sq.nextval, #{movie_name}, #{movie_level}, #{movie_genre}, #{movie_content}, #{movie_director}, #{movie_actor}, #{movie_runtime} )

insert into play (user_no, movie_no, play_theater, play_day, play_time, play_inwon, play_seat, play_price, movie_name) values (#{user_no}, #{movie_no}, #{play_theater}, #{play_day}, #{play_time}, #{play_inwon}, #{play_seat}, #{play_price}, #{movie_name})
insert into review (re_no, re_content, movie_no, user_no) values (review_sq.NEXTVAL, #{re_content}, #{movie_no}, #{user_no})
